about_the_game:
In Save Your Nuts, crafty squirrels organize a tournament to challenge other animals in a physics-based competition for the ages. Make daring plays alongside your teammates, grab food power-ups, and tackle your opponents to steal their nuts in this wild multiplayer-focused party game!
This Expansion Pack offer a new arena for the battles !
detailed_description:
In Save Your Nuts, crafty squirrels organize a tournament to challenge other animals in a physics-based competition for the ages. Make daring plays alongside your teammates, grab food power-ups, and tackle your opponents to steal their nuts in this wild multiplayer-focused party game!
This Expansion Pack offer a new arena for the battles !
legal_notice: © 2020 Triple Scale Games. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Save Your Nuts - Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2 or Later
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
